definition_en: prediction of the time at which a system or a component will malfunction

relation_to: vehicle health condition, engine health condition, battery health condition

synonyms_en: remaining useful lifetime (RUL), remaining useful life, remaining life

definition_en: Remaining distance the vehicle will drive in the future.
Remaining time the vehicle will drive in the future.
A model that quantifies the risk of failure for a vehicle at any moment in time and use this information to improve scheduling of maintenance.
process of periodic inspection and repair
